name: The Power Grid
description:
You are the Electron, all powerful, power-carrying being. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around the streets and light up all the houses!

This is my fourth game, third completed. While making it I got to do things I had never done before, and I think it ended up amazing (at least for me lol). I hope you will have, at least, a somewhat happy time playing my creation. If you're playing during the BTP Game Jam #3, feel free to leave a (good, lolmao) rating ;D

Notes: Sound setting is to the right in the beginning.

I noticed right now that below every level selection button, if it is unlocked it says "Unlocked   Click to" when it should actually have said "Unlocked   Click to Play"

Notify me if something is wrong.
